meanings.definition: A substance or agent that makes something brighter.
meanings.sent1: The laundry detergent contains brighteners to make clothes look whiter.
meanings.sent2: She added brighteners to the paint to enhance its luminosity.
meanings.sent3: The brighteners in the room spray made everything shine like a disco ball.
meanings.sent4: Her smile acted as a brightener, lighting up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight acted as a natural brightener, illuminating the garden with warmth.

meanings.definition: People or things that bring joy or happiness.
meanings.sent1: Her friends are true brighteners in her life, always bringing laughter and fun.
meanings.sent2: The children's laughter was a brightener on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent3: The brighteners at the party were the adorable puppies running around.
meanings.sent4: Music has always been a brightener in his life, lifting his spirits in tough times.
meanings.sent5: Her positive attitude acted as a brightener, spreading happiness wherever she went.
